Mr. Frank E. Schooley

My dear Frank;
fhere doesn’t seem to me to be any
reason why the Oklahoma Baptist University Radio
Studios shouldn’t be accepted for an associate
membership in the HAEB. My vote is yes.
Sincerely yours,
Director
MSNsc
‘New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
